Description: TapStack - Full new build of a production-ready, KMS-encrypted, VPC-based environment in us-east-1 with S3+Lifecycle, Lambda+S3 trigger+API Gateway, DynamoDB (auto-scaling), RDS Multi-AZ, SNS, CloudWatch metrics/alarms, CloudTrail auditing, bastion host, and IAM least-privilege. All names include ENVIRONMENT_SUFFIX.

ProjectName.Description: Project/system slug (lowercase, used in tags and names)
ProjectName.ConstraintDescription: 3-31 chars, start with letter, lowercase letters/digits/hyphens.

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Suffix appended to resource names to avoid collisions across environments
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: 2-20 chars, lowercase letters, digits, hyphens only.

BastionAllowedCidr.Description: CIDR allowed to SSH to bastion (tighten in production)

AppHttpAllowedCidr.Description: CIDR allowed to reach application HTTP port 80

EmailSubscription.Description: Optional email for SNS subscription (leave blank to skip)
